BasicInfo.short: Filtrbox provides a social media monitoring platform for marketers, PR professionals, brand managers, and customer service teams.

Products.name: Filtrbox
Products.description: Filtrbox is the media monitoring service of choice for savvy professionals. The web-based service allows users to collect, filter and share
